body_html: I removed "bazel clean" as a compulsory step for non-Docker builds and added "--genrule_strategy=standalone" for such builds. In addition, I added TF_BUILD_BAZEL_CLEAN as an optional environment variable.
body_text: I removed "bazel clean" as a compulsory step for non-Docker builds and added "--genrule_strategy=standalone" for such builds.  In addition, I added TF_BUILD_BAZEL_CLEAN as an optional environment variable.
body: I removed "bazel clean" as a compulsory step for non-Docker builds and added "--genrule_strategy=standalone" for such builds.  In addition, I added TF_BUILD_BAZEL_CLEAN as an optional environment variable.
